page.title: 11HOME LIFE (contd.)
page.content: dinnertime. In our school you have a choice of bringing a packed lunch, going home, taking school dinner or going to the cafeteria. I took cafeteria lunch. After our second period of Maths we went to Games. As the weather was good we went to the beach for a swim. Although school ends at 3.30 p.m. our bus does not come until 4.10 p.m. When I got home I went up to the local football pitches to watch a match between Carginagh and Ballyveagh. After tea I had a shower and got dressed to go out to the cinema to see "Breakdance II". When the film finished my friends and I went to the "Chicken Villa" for a gravy chip. We ate these as we walked round the harbour before going home to bed.
